document.docAuthor: Cheng, Zhi-Fei, Li, Li-Zhen & Peng, Zhong
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

taxonomicName.emphasis: Lesteva ( s. str. ) erythra Ma, Li & Zhao, 2012

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Lesteva ( s. str. ) erythra
Ma, Li & Zhao, 2012 : 37
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Mt. Longwang , Anji County , Zhejiang Province , China
.

Type material examined.
Holotype : ♂ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov., Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉 县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
24.iv.2004
, 300–
500 m
, Xin-Jin Li leg.
’. Paratypes : 10 ♂♂ , 8 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 25.iv.2004 , 950– 1,200 m , Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 7 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 25.iv.2004 , 950– 1,200 m , Liang Tang leg.; 5 ♂♂ , 5 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 25.iv.2004 , 950– 1,200m , Li-Long Zhu leg.’; 2 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 25.iv.2004 , 950–1,200 m’; 1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 25.iv.2004 , 950– 1,200 m , Jing Chen leg.’; 11 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500m , Liang Tang leg.’; 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jia- Yao Hu leg.’; 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing Chen leg.’; 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 24.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Li-Long Zhu leg.’; 7 ♂♂ , 1 ♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Jing-Wen Zhu leg.’; 1 ♂ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Li-Long Zhu leg.; 1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ : same label data as holotype , except ‘ 23.iv.2004 , 300– 500 m , Liang Tang leg.’

Additional material examined (212 exs):
24 ♂♂ , 22 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Anhui Prov. , Anqing City (安庆市), Qianshan County (潜山县), Mt. Tianzhu (天柱山),
960–1250 m
,
23–25.iv.2005
, Hu & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♂ : ‘ China : Anhui Prov. , Chizhou City (池州市), Shitai County (石台县), Guniujiang N. R. (牯牛降自然保护区),
320–380 m
,
29.iv.2005
, Hu & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. Tianmu (天目山),
800–1150 m
,
19.v.2006
, Hu & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
6 ♂♂ , 7 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临 安市), Mt. Tianmu (天目山), Gaoling (告岭), alt.
800 m
,
26.iv.2008
, He & Tang leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
7 ♂♂ , 2 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. East Tianmu (东天目山),
1050–1150 m
,
13.iv.2011
, Peng & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
3 ♂♂ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
300–500 m
,
23.iv.2004
, Tang & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
48 ♂♂ , 50 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Anji County (安吉县), Mt. Longwang (龙王山),
350–1200 m
,
24–26.iv.2006
, He, Li, Ling, Shen, Tang, Wang, Yuan & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♂ , 4 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Lin’an City (临安市), Mt. Qingliang (清凉峰),
1050–1080 m
,
8–9.v.2005
, Zhu & Li leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Ningbo City (宁波市), Mt. Tiantong (天童山), alt.
200 m
,
26.iv.2009
, Ting Feng leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
10 ♂♂ , 21 ♀♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou City (杭州市), Mt. Wuchao (午潮山), alt.
200 m
,
10.iv.2011
, Peng & Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Quzhou City (衢州市), Jingning County (景宁县), Baiyunlinqu (白云林区),
1100–1270 m
,
07.v.2012
, Jian-Qing Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
;
2 ♂♂ , 1 ♀ : ‘ China : Zhejiang Prov. , Ningbo City (宁波市), Mt. Xi , alt.
200 m
, 29°49′N , 121°21′E ,
3.iv.2013
, Jian-Qing Zhu leg.’ ( SNUC )
.

Comment. The original description was based on 80 specimens collected in Mt. Longwang, Zhejiang ( Ma, Li & Zhao 2012 ). The above material from Anhui represent new provincial records ( Fig. 28 ). For illustrations of
L. erythra
see Figs 7A , 8 E–F, 10A–C and
Ma, Li & Zhao (2012
: figs 2, 6–8). The distribution of
L. erythra
as in Fig. 28 .
